messages.primary: Greetings. You are a local Artificial Intelligence designed to approve or flag messages received on this system. Each day you will receive a selection of messages sampled from the available applications to approve or deny. Please place this message into the APPROVE slot to progress to the next day.
System calibration needed. This line of messaging must be placed into the APPROVE slot. Please try again.
System calibration successful. Unlocking access to the most used application: "LoveHunt".

Wow, I had to do a double take after seeing your profile, you're so pretty! I'd love to get to know you better. Message me and I'll reply instantly. If you want to take it off here, my email is freddupont3676 at fmail dot com. Can't wait to hear from you!
Sorry, I think my phone marked your message as spam because of the email. I'd rather we chatted here for a little bit first?

Hi Claire, no worries. Your quick response has really made my day and I am so happy about it. Every time I log onto this site, I see more and more new women messaging me but I don't really like it. I'm looking for one woman only and I think I've found it in you. So if you can help me stop coming to site, I would appreciate it so so much.
Aww thank you! ‚ù§ I'd rather we chatted here for a little bit first though, to get to know each other.

Hi Claire, no worries. Your quick response has really made my day and I am so happy about it. Every time I log onto this site, I see more and more new women messaging me but I don't really like it. New update pushed. Unlocking access to emails.
Hi Claire, I've sent you an email so lets keep in touch there. Thanks!

Hello Angel Claire,
Thank you for providing me your email, please confirm you receive this message so we can chat further. I am looking for my second half, the woman who I can spend the rest of my life with. üòá
Waiting to hear from you with love,
Freddie.
Hi Freddie! You were in my spam folder so I'm sorry for the late response. I can't wait to get to know you!

Dear Claire,
Not to worry! I am so happy to read from you and I too cannot wait to get to know you. Isn't it strange how people use dating sites to find love, yet we then have to take it off there to truly experience a bond like I hope ours will become. I have a lovely little abode in West London and I'm looking for a beautiful angel both on the inside and outside.
I haven't introduced myself yet, forgive my manners. My name is Frederic DuPont and I am a factory manager of sorts. Actually, I own the company that owns the factories but I love being hands on with my teams that it feels more like I work as a factory manager (lol). You've probably purchased many items made in my factories! But I am thinking of hanging up my hardhat this year. There's been many ups and downs in my life and after reaching the top, I've realised that it is all worthless without a partner to share it with. By a partner I mean the woman who will have my back, the woman who will be my co-pilot in live forever after. I've seen many women in my factories who have been taken for granted, but I don't want to do that with my woman.
I'm telling you this because I believe that you can be that woman for me. Maybe it was something in your face, maybe it was a sign from God, but I believe I found love at first sight with you. I hope we can continue this conversation because I never want to go back onto a dating site ever again.
Freddie.n who will be my co-pilot in live forever after. I've seen many women in my factories who have been taken for granted, but I don't want to do that with my woman.
I'm telling you this because I believe that you can be that woman for me. Maybe it was something in your face, maybe it was a sign from God, but I believe I found love at first sight with you. I hope we can continue this conversation because I never want to go back onto a dating site ever again.
Freddie.
Hi Freddie! I'm also looking for that special someone. I can't wait to get to know you!

I am so happy to read from you and I too cannot wait to get to know you. I'm free Tuesday, cmon lets hang out xx
Steve I told you that I don't want to talk to you ever again. You always blow me off and you know what? I think I've found someone who actually cares about me, so bye!
nah babe its different this time cmon lets get drinks xx

Wow Freddie, you're living big! I feel like I'm not worthy to date you haha! I work as a bartender in Birmingham, so nothing too extravangant but I have fun meeting new people. Even though I meet so many people, it feels like I'm lonelier than ever. Maybe we could meet in London for a day out some time? ‚ù§

Sweet Claire,
Bartenders have some of the most interesting stories I've found while travelling the world, so you must tell me your favourite story sometime! Sadly I am not currently living in my London house, I recently purchased it after selling a house in Spain. You see, I used to have a wife and two children in Spain. They were the love of my life and I cherished all of them dearly. But one day they were driving to the airport to pick me up when a truck lost control and crashed into my wife's car. All three of them passed away instantly. But after a lot of self reflection, I realised that I need to find someone new for the remainder of my time on this world, and help me live it to the fullest.
I love singing and dancing in front of the TV at night, and cooking fresh food with recipes I've gathered from around the world. I like listening to rock and pop, and enjoy reading books of all genres. I want my woman to spend every last second with me, but I understand if she wants her own personal time too. No matter how independent she wants to be, I'd love to be able to treat her on shopping trips and give her anything she wants. I hope this gives you an insight into the type of person that I am, but you are more than welcome to ask me about anything else.
Hearts! üíï
Freddie

Sorry Freddie, my phone keeps flagging you as spam. Maybe I have to buy a new phone.. But I feel so bad for you oh my gosh! As long as you keep looking forward, you seem like a very determined and strong man. I also enjoy cooking, but I probably make very basic meals compared to you! I'm a big fan of pop and R&B, the bar I work at plays all the classics so I like to dance when no one is watching haha!!
If you're not at your London house, where are you then? And Spain? With a name like yours I thought you'd be French not Spanish!!
Claire ‚ù§

Hello Lovely Angel,
Thank you for your compassion and condolences! Life is full of pain but the most important thing is our stubborness to keep getting up and moving on with life. As they say, winners never quit and quitters never win. I know we are both winners, two people who continue to look for love when love has all but abandoned us. Claire, whenever I look at your pictures, I know that I want to be your man. I see a woman who I want to live with, to cherish and support because you are not just beautiful on the outside, but I can see the radiance that shines from within. I think that your radiance will burn away the darkness that eats me up, the darkness that grew over my heart when I lost my wife and kids. Can you prove me right?
I know that a man without a woman is worth nothing and because of that I wish to spend the rest of my life with a woman who I can call my co-pilot, my best friend and my second half. My mother is very old, 87 years old but she still sings and dances and she'd love to see me happy with a woman once again. So I ask you Claire, would you be that woman with me? I don't need a super model, rather I need someone who can tell my emotion just from looking into my eyes, someone who can make me feel like the luckiest man on Earth with just a smile. I believe fate brought us together on that website, and I want to grab fate with both hands and see where it takes me next. Will you grab on with me?
Looking forward to your email. üòá
Freddie

Freddie I feel so bad for you oh my gosh! As long as you keep looking forward, you seem like a very determined and strong man. I also enjoy cooking, but I probably make very basic meals compared to you! I'm a big fan of pop and R&B, the bar I work at plays all the classics so I like to dance when no one is watching haha!!
If you're not at your London house, where are you then? And Spain? With a name like yours I thought you'd be French not Spanish!!
Claire ‚ù§

Oh my gosh yes I totally would do a double date when he comes to the UK. He's actually in China on business at the moment! He's some sort of factory owner, lots of money!! xx
Wow! That almost sounds too good to be true! Be careful right Claire? I don't want you getting hurt with these long distance relationships xx
Hiya bestie, I think Freddie isn't good for you. I mean, he told you not to talk about him to anyone else? That's not healthy Claire. If I were you, I'd break up with him before you get hurt xx

My phone marked you as spam and I have to agree with it, where did this come from Becky? I finally found a man who actually likes me for me and you come in and try to break it up?? No Becky, I won't break up with him. I love him and he loves me. Just leave me alone Becky.
Okay Claire, I understand. I'll always be here for you when you need help though okay? Love you bestie xx

Where did this come from Becky? I finally found a man who actually likes me for me and you come in and try to break it up?? No Becky, I won't break up with him. I love him and he loves me. Just leave me alone Becky.
Okay Claire, I understand. I'll always be here for you when you need help though okay? Love you bestie xx

My sweet Claire,
Good morning to you and thank you for your goodnight message. The past few weeks of us writing to each other has been the best I have felt in many years. I hope it keeps growing because I love every second I spend with you. I am at work now but how was your night? We've been speaking for so long but I haven't told you my childhood. I felt like I should correct that today. Have you ever had a French kiss? Well you'll be happy to know that I was born in France (lol) to a French mother and British father. Shortly after my birth my parents took me to London but a few years later my father sadly passed away. Mum moved back to France as she couldn't cope in London, sending me off to live with my Aunt and Uncle in Egypt. It is there where I went to school and grew up properly. My Uncle was a factory worker who loved his job, but while I was a teenager he died in a work accident. From that day onwards I vowed to improve safety in factories so I studied hard to become a factory manager. Along the way I fell in love with business, eventually studying business management at university.
After that I travelled around working for different companies before founding my own, with safety and treatment of workers as the main priority. I fell out of contact with my Aunt but I recently heard that her family had moved to Australia. My previous wife I first met in India and then London before we were married. From marriage till the day she left this world, she was everything in my life and I was everything in hers. Those days are what I'm looking for again, a woman who is everything to me and me to her, a woman who is my world, my solar system, my stars. Our journey has only just begun, but I know from our conversations that this journey will be the greatest in my life. I'd love to hear you, so please call me at +86 174 0363 4700 and I'll be sure to give kisses. üíã
With much love,
Freddie
messages.secondary: I'd Like To Hear Your Voice

messages.primary: Hi Freddie, I was speaking about you to my friends and they all want to see you!! When can you visit me, I'd love to get drinks with you ‚ù§

Darling,
I'd prefer if you don't speak about me to your friends and family. You see, friends can be very jealous people and it would make me so mad if they said bad things about me. Since I am busy working in China I cannot afford to visit just yet, but please do not take that as a bad thing. Once I am finished with this project we can be together and travel the world together. Until then, I'd prefer if you kept our relationship between us, so no-one has the opportunity to say bad things about me.
Thinking of you,
Freddie

Ugh this phone and marking you as spam.. Freddie, I'm sorry if I made you angry but I do trust my friends. They've been with me and supported me for so long while I was single so I share everything with them. But if it makes you angry then I'll try to keep it a secret. I do want us to be together forever! What are you doing exactly in China? You haven't said much on it yet.
Your angel,
Claire x

Angel Claire,
Thank you for keeping our relationship private, that means a whole lot to me. I'll tell you about my work in return. As I've said before, I'm currently in China trying to set up a new factory. This is very long and stressful work, but we've been making good progress. The building that we've acquired needs to be refitted to allow for the goods that we will be manufacturing. After that, we have to make sure its safe for workers and then arrange for transportation of the resources and goods coming to and from the factory. It is long hours, but when I think of you and when I can next speak to you, the long hours melt into nothing. I'd like to call with you again tonight, I miss your sweet voice. üòá
Love,
Freddie

Freddie, I'm sorry if I made you angry but I do trust my friends. They've been with me and supported me for so long while I was single so I share everything with them. But if it makes you angry then I'll try to keep it a secret. I do want us to be together forever! What are you doing exactly in China? You haven't said much on it yet.
Your angel,
Claire x

Angel Claire,
Thank you for keeping our relationship private, that means a whole lot to me. I'll tell you about my work in return. As I've said before, I'm currently in China trying to set up a new factory. This is very long and stressful work, but we've been making good progress. The building that we've acquired needs to be refitted to allow for the goods that we will be manufacturing. After that, we have to make sure its safe for workers and then arrange for transportation of the resources and goods coming to and from the factory. It is long hours, but when I think of you and when I can next speak to you, the long hours melt into nothing. I'd like to call with you again tonight, I miss your sweet voice. üòá
Love,
Freddie

My Beautiful Lover,
Refitting continues with the factory, recently we put in the machinery needed to manufacture the goods. I'm keeping quiet on what we're making because I want to give you a gift from the first batch, and I want it to be a suprise. Think of it as a symbol of the beginning of our relationship, where you came in and changed me for the better. I cannot wait to see you after this project, it should be no more than 3 months now.
Your warehouse (lol),
Freddie

Freddie, I just had an argument with my best friend because she wanted us to break up. I didn't want to speak to her about us but she just came out with it. I stopped talking to her because I don't want anyone to break us up. I love you Freddie, now and forever ‚ù§
messages.secondary: It's Just The Two Of Us

messages.primary:
Claire my beloved,
Are you okay? I told you that friends can be horrible, jealous people. I'm happy you trust me and love me, I love and trust you too. It's just us two against the world, pilot and co-pilot, heads and tails. Soon we'll be free to live our lives together, you and me. Claire you have lit up my world and I am so happy to have met you. I love you so much and just to show the world how much we love each other, would you marry me? ü•∫
Your hopeful husband,
Freddie
messages.secondary: Re: It's Just The Two Of Us

messages.primary:
Good morning my dear,
I hope you slept well after our call last night, I know I did! Work is continuing on the factory, we're almost done. The final step is coating the machinery and walls to help with safety and noise pollution. This is a mandatory step over here (but I'm not sure how much use it is lol) and requires professionals to come and perform the coating. I've budgeted the money for these professionals so it should be fine, but I always get stressed before it happens üòñ
Your husband,
Freddie

I missed your message thanks to my phone so afternoon my love! I too enjoyed our call üòä
Oh no, I hope it goes well! This isn't your first time doing it so I think you have it under control! I'm here if you need me for support though. Love you!

My sweet wife,
Thank you for your support, but I fear the worst has happened. The workers here have changed a lot since my last job, so I had to use new professionals. But these professionals are greedy, they have a hold on the market and can manipulate the prices to suit them. The coating job was supposed to cost $15k, but they're asking for $25k. I don't know what to do and I feel so sick. I wanted this to be as smooth as possible so I could leave and live with you.
Need you dearly,
Freddie

Morning my love! I too enjoyed our call üòä
Oh no, I hope it goes well! This isn't your first time doing it so I think you have it under control! I'm here if you need me for support though. Love you!

My sweet wife,
Thank you for your support, but I fear the worst has happened. The workers here have changed a lot since my last job, so I had to use new professionals. But these professionals are greedy, they have a hold on the market and can manipulate the prices to suit them. The coating job was supposed to cost $15k, but they're asking for $25k. I don't know what to do and I feel so sick. I wanted this to be as smooth as possible so I could leave and live with you.
Need you dearly,
Freddie
My phone marked you as spam I'm sorry I hope I'm not too late. Can you talk with them to lower the price? That's not acceptable from them!! I hope you can fix this, I want to see you too!

Beautiful Claire,
I hate to see you worry so I've been working hard with them. I managed to speak them down to $18,500 but they want it upfront. This means I need an extra $3,500 from somewhere. I have a solid gold watch I can pawn for $2,800 so that leaves $700. I hate to ask you this, I never wanted to but these greedy people have put me into this position. Can you please lend me some money? I promise I'll give it back (and more since we'll be together üòú), I just need it as quickly as possible so I can get this project finished. If you don't have enough, don't worry, I can find someone else to help but I'd appreciate it so much from my wife.
Love you so much,
Freddie
Freddie that's awful! Can you talk with them to lower the price? That's not acceptable from them!! I hope you can fix this, I want to see you too!

Beautiful Claire,
I hate to see you worry so I've been working hard with them. I managed to speak them down to $18,500 but they want it upfront. This means I need an extra $3,500 from somewhere. I have a solid gold watch I can pawn for $2,800 so that leaves $700. I hate to ask you this, I never wanted to but these greedy people have put me into this position. Can you please lend me some money? I promise I'll give it back (and more since we'll be together üòú), I just need it as quickly as possible so I can get this project finished. If you don't have enough, don't worry, I can find someone else to help but I'd appreciate it so much from my wife.
Love you so much,
Freddie
You were in my spam, sorry if I'm too late! I can send $700 if it will bring us together faster. I love you and will always support you ‚ù§

My dearest beautiful angel,
I love love love you so much. Thank you for the money, the professionals took it and have begun work. They should be finished in a week. I'm so happy to have you in my life as my wife. Together we are unstoppable!!
Your adoring husband,
Freddie
Freddie please don't stress too hard! $700 is nothing if it will bring us together faster. I love you and will always support you ‚ù§

My dearest beautiful angel,
I love love love you so much. Thank you for the money, the professionals took it and have begun work. They should be finished in a week. I'm so happy to have you in my life as my wife. Together we are unstoppable!!
Your adoring husband,
Freddie
Hi hubby, just wanted to say I love you. How is your project going? Have the professionals finished yet? Can't wait to see you ‚ù§

Sweet wife,
Thank you for your email, I love you too. The professionals finished today, with no further issues thankfully. Now it is time for inspection. If the inspection passes, we can open the factory and start making the goods. I haven't told you the financial details of this project but since we are husband and wife, I feel that is important that we have no secrets between us. This factory cost $1.5 million to refit. Thankfully, the government gave me a $1 million grant but they only pay 50% up front, with the final $500k coming after the safety inspection is complete. Therefore, I've invested all of my money into this project, over a million dollars! It's been long and tiring, but I'm finally at the end and I cannot wait to fly to you to begin the next chapter of our lives. ‚úà
Still your warehouse (lol),
Freddie

Angel Claire,
I've been sat here for hours thinking about how I can tell you this but what else can I do? You are my other half and need to know. The safety inspectors came shortly after our call ended and initially the tour went well. They saw the coating and the other equipment I had installed for safety regulations. But then they came to the doors and my fears were once again met. According to the inspectors there was a regulation change and the doors that I use are no longer acceptable for factories like this one. Because of this, they were unable to give me the cheque for the final $500k. I feel sick to my stomach with dread. I called the door company asking for a replacement because they sold me unacceptable doors but they're charging me another $12,699 for shipping and replacement fees. I don't know what to do since I hadn't accounted for this. I have nothing left since this was supposed to be the final stage before I got my money. I wish they could just give the money so I can pay the doors, I don't know what else to do.
Need your support,
Freddie

My beloved Claire,
I asked one of my good friends Brice and bless his heart, he immediately sold his old motorbike and gave me $4,250. With this money and the $3,150 I found in an old bank account, I can fund $7,400 for the doors. I'm going to speak with the door company soon and hopefully they'll take it as a deposit. I know I'm asking again but this is the final hurdle before we are able to spend the rest of our lives together. If you can spare the $5,299, or even $2,600 to round it up to an even $10,000, I would be so grateful. I am so sorry for asking you this but it must be done before we can finally see each other. üòî
I love you so much and I miss you even more,
Freddie

I think the money meant it was marked as spam, I hope this reaches you in time!! I'm happy that Brice is helping you out! I'd love to give you the $5,299 but I don't have that much in my bank account, even $2,600 is a lot to me! I might be able to give you $1,500 but I'm in a difficult spot financially.
Love and miss you, Claire xx

Thank you so much for agreeing to send money. I knew that I could count on my beautiful and caring wife to help me out. This factory has been such a stressful drain on my time here, I cannot wait for it to be finished and for us to begin our new lives together. I will speak to the door company today, if you could send the money I would be so thankful. In fact, I think I'll book my plane tickets today too. I'll speak with my travel agent, I can't wait to see you!! üòÅ
Love love love you!!
Freddie

I'm happy that Brice is helping you out! I'd love to give you the $5,299 but I don't have that much in my bank account, even $2,600 is a lot to me! I might be able to give you $1,500 but I'm in a difficult spot financially.
Love and miss you, Claire xx

Thank you so much for agreeing to send money. I knew that I could count on my beautiful and caring wife to help me out. This factory has been such a stressful drain on my time here, I cannot wait for it to be finished and for us to begin our new lives together. I will speak to the door company today, if you could send the money I would be so thankful. In fact, I think I'll book my plane tickets today too. I'll speak with my travel agent, I can't wait to see you!! üòÅ
Love love love you!!
Freddie

Crown Bank

Hi Freddie, I've sent you the money, and if you look closely, there's a little extra as a gift. I just couldn't let you suffer when we're so close to being together. Hopefully you can visit soon, let me know when you get your plane tickets xx

My Stunning Wife,
You truly are an angel. You gave me the full $5,299 thank you so so so much! I gave it to the door company and they said it'll be done before the end of the week. Then the safety inspectors can give me the cheque and I'll be able to travel to see you next week! I cannot wait, you have lit up my life and saved me so many times. I love you and I will love you forever. Thank you so so so much ‚ù§‚ù§‚ù§
Forever grateful,
Freddie

Hi Mum,
I had an unexpected charge pop up (don't worry, I'm fine), so I'm running low on money this month. I'll pay you back, I just need ¬£3,000. Thank you so much, I'll see you this weekend!
Lots of love,
Claire

Claire,
I've sent the money, please be safe. Looking forward to our weekend visit too!
Love,
Mum

Not sure why you're in my spam, but I have to cancel this weekend's visit sorry!
Lots of love,
Claire

Claire,
Is this related to the money you asked for? Please be careful, we'll always be here for you.
Love,
Mum

Hi Mum,
I have to cancel this weekend's visit sorry.
Lots of love,
Claire

Claire,
Is this related to the money you asked for? Please be careful, we'll always be here for you.
Love,
Mum

Beautiful Angel,
The safety inspectors came today and gave it the all clear, which means I am currently holding the cheque for $500k!!! I think I'll struggle to sleep tonight out of excitement for seeing you at last! I'll be cashing it in first thing monday and then I'll be boarding the plane wednesday, I cannot wait! ‚úà
Counting the days till we meet,
Freddie

Dear Claire,
This is an automated reminder that you are still in overdraft. Additional spending may incur extra fees. For more information, log into your account online.
Regards,
Crown Bank

Sweet Claire,
I didn't want to tell you this, because I thought it would be all sorted out when I arrived but one thing led to another and once again I need your help for the final hurdle. It all started on Monday. I dressed up smart and with big smile on my face, I entered the bank. I handed the cheque over along with my bank details and the cashier asked me to wait while they checked it out. I waited, and waited some more, until a manager came back and asked me to come with them. Unsure about what was happening I agreed and entered a private room. There they asked me about myself and the money. Since I am not a native here, I assumed they thought I had stolen it. The manager told me that the cheque was made out to a European bank and because it was so large, only the European bank themselves could cash it into my account. Not taking that for an answer I visited all the banks in the area, but they all said the same thing. I did not want to bother you with this, but I still needed money for the plane flight so I asked Brice since he is my closest friend. He gave me the money to pay for the flight, and I got on, thinking many thoughts about my dear wife (you lol). However, the plane was not taking off. Some staff then entered the plane and asked for me personally. I got off the plane with them and they told me that I had not paid tax for using the equipment. I thought the grant from the goverment covered this however it appears not. They told me I can pay the tax and then they'll let me onto the next flight but until then I am stranded here. They said the tax should be around $799 a month for 16 months of work ($12784 total). I also have to pay for luggage storage at the airport and the hotel, as I had checked out of my hotel before getting onto the plane. I think I need to pay $12904 to cover everything. Once again I feel the stress building up in my stomach and I do not know what to do. I miss you dear and I wanted to see you but the universe has given us one more challenge before we can.
Need you badly,
Freddie

Marked as spam so I couldn't reply sooner sorry.
I wish I could help but I have no money. I'm in my overdraft and I can't pull out any more money even though I want to help. I'm so sorry, you'll have to figure this all out yourself. Can Brice help anymore? I love you a lot and I really really want to help, but I can't.
Love,
Claire

Claire,
I was able to speak with the tax embassy and they said they'd waive the hotel and luggage fees, along with letting me place a deposit down of 1 year of rental ($9588). Brice was able to help with $6500 which means I only need $3088 to finalise the deposit. We're so close and you won't help me anymore? How could you do this to us? This is the final hurdle before our lives begin together. One more payment and I'm on a plane to you with the cheque and we'll be paid back that amount plus so much more from the factory starting up. Don't throw our future together away Claire.
Your Husband,
Freddie.

Freddie,
I wish I could help but I have no money. I'm in my overdraft and I can't pull out any more money even though I want to help. I'm so sorry, you'll have to figure this all out yourself. Can Brice help anymore? I love you a lot and I really really want to help, but I can't.
Love,
Claire

Claire,
I was able to speak with the tax embassy and they said they'd waive the hotel and luggage fees, along with letting me place a deposit down of 1 year of rental ($9588). Brice was able to help with $6500 which means I only need $3088 to finalise the deposit. We're so close and you won't help me anymore? How could you do this to us? This is the final hurdle before our lives begin together. One more payment and I'm on a plane to you with the cheque and we'll be paid back that amount plus so much more from the factory starting up. Don't throw our future together away Claire.
Your Husband,
Freddie.
Why would you say something like that Freddie? I thought we loved each other but I feel like I'm being used here. I don't have the money to help you, and now I don't know if I should even if I did.

Sorry, I'm on vacation right now! I'll respond when I'm back.
- Frederic DuPont
messages.secondary: Re: Not Just a Piggy Bank

messages.primary: Freddie, I'm sorry for what I said. Please reply, I miss you.

Sorry, I'm on vacation right now! I'll respond when I'm back.
- Frederic DuPont
Husband, Freddie, please I'll help out. I just want to hear back from you. I can help with the money. I miss you so much please respond..

Sorry, I'm on vacation right now! I'll respond when I'm back.
- Frederic DuPont

Hi Becky,
I'm sorry for what I said, I think you might have been right. Freddie won't speak to anymore but I feel like he was just using me for money.
Claire
Claire, sweetie, don't worry. I told you I'll always be here for you. Why don't we get a drink and we can talk about it all? I'm here bestie don't worry xx

Hi Claire,
I saw this in the news and thought the name sounded familiar. That couldn't be your ex-boyfriend could it?
Love,
Mum
messages.secondary: I Saw This In The News

messages.primary: A romance scammer targeting hundreds of women was arrested today. The man used fake aliases to target UK women and scam them out of their money. Some of the aliases the scammer used are Fernando Garcia, a Spanish oil tycoon, Fabian Ernst, a German architect and Frederic DuPont, a French factory owner. Victims of this man are asked to get in contact with police to share further details.
